page.title: 04Village Festival Guilsboro'
page.content: It was aimed to raise 30 000 pounds towards the cost of repairs to Saint Etheldreda's Church tower at a village festival,the whole population working together. {June 28th} Preview of Flower Festival Theme - The Seven Ages of Man. { PROGRAMME }June 29th TIME EVENT PLACE 12 - 6pm Flower Festival Church 2 - 6pm 7 gardens open Village 2 - 5pm Teas Village hall 4pm Music Church 8pm Fashion Show The Old House 10 - 7pm Wild Life The Grange JUNE 30th events of the previous day continued and were added to by auctions,wine and cheese parties and a choral evensong: By Sunday evening 23 079 pounds had been raised.
